availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Isaiah W. Woodside (Ritchie County, West Virginia, farmer)

body.p: Ritchie County, West Virginia, farmer. Pennsylvania native. Son of John Woodside and Mary Woodside. Attended school in Ritchie County, Virginia, in 1850. Farmer in Ritchie County, West Virginia, in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Virginia, Ritchie County, Western District, p. 244B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Ritchie County, WV, October-November 1863, p. 498.
